item.title: How do I start?
item.category: "How do I start in cyber security?"
item.description: Get started in the exciting field of cyber security with our helpful guide. Learn about recommended books, certifications, and online learning resources to kickstart your career. Explore the possibilities of a career in cyber security with SimeonOnSecurity.
